data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.expected_result: It should display a 404, an error, or kick back to General Information.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Going to a nonexistent sub page of your application does not return a 404 page or kick back out to General Information.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an application in the Developer Portal - remove "/information" and append "/djffdskjfds" to the url.
